name: cardano-php/cip8-verifier
description: A PHP library to verify Cardano CIP-8 signed messages.

scripts.test:coverage: @php -r "if (extension_loaded('xdebug') || extension_loaded('pcov')) { system('vendor/bin/pest --coverage --min=80'); } else { echo 'Code coverage requires Xdebug or PCOV extension. Install with: composer install --dev && enable Xdebug or PCOV.\n'; system('vendor/bin/pest'); }"
